original_text: But the stranger that dwelleth with you shall be unto you as one born among you, and thou shalt love him as thyself; for ye were strangers in the land of Egypt: I am the Lord your God.
korean_text: 너희와 함께 있는 거류민을 너희 중에서 낳은 자 같이 여기며 자기 같이 사랑하라 너희도 애굽 땅에서 거류민이 되었었느니라 나는 너희의 하나님 여호와이니라

sentences.original_text: But the stranger that dwelleth with you
shall be unto you as one born among you
sentences.korean_translation: 너희 중에서 태어난 자와 같을 것이며

sentences.original_text: and thou shalt love him as thyself
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 네 자신처럼 그를 사랑해야 하리라

sentences.original_text: for ye were strangers in the land of Egypt
I am the Lord your God
